title: Leonel Vielma
text:
Leonel Gerardo Vielma Peña (born 30 August 1978) is a Venezuelan <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a> and former player who played as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>. He is the current manager of <a href="Estudiantes%20de%20M%C3%A9rida%20F.C.">Estudiantes de Mérida</a>.
International career.
Born in <a href="M%C3%A9rida%2C%20M%C3%A9rida">Mérida</a>, Vielma has played over 50 games for the Venezuela national team and has played club football in Venezuela and <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>.
